#summary &ecirc character entity

#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesE

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesE E] > &ecirc

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&Ecirc;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00ca/index.htm U+000CA].
  * `&Ecirc` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00ca/index.htm U+000CA].
  * `&ecirc;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00ea/index.htm U+000EA].
  * `&ecirc` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00ea/index.htm U+000EA].
